EmailTemplate.name: Palmetto Property Contacts
EmailTemplate.subject: Palmetto Property Contact Info.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Tenant,
Your point of contact for rent payment has changed. Please contact the following...
Suzanne Woolever Email: suzanne.woolever@palmetto.com Phone: 854-999-1803
Katherine Morales Email: katherine.morales@palmetto.com Phone: 854-999-1784
You can pay your rent two different ways.
1) Mail Certified Funds to: Palmetto Property Management PO Box 22615 Charleston, SC 29413
2) Pay with credit card or bank account online through the tenant portal:
www.gopalmettoproperty.com
Thank you
